title: New Client Question...cant copy/paste or block ppl..help
body:
Hi, just wondering how you can copy and paste text in the new client, as there is no option now. I right click to copy/paste..nothing. Also I cant block people anymore...right clicking on people does nothing. These options were on the old client.
 
Any info on this would be great.

As for the new client performance so far..seems fine for me.

replies.body: Not being able to block has already felt noticable, I think cntrl C and cntrl V still work though.
